title: Claimant pay details (optional)
subtitle: Pay details provided on ET1
payBeforeTaxLabel: Pay BEFORE tax and National Insurance
payAfterTaxLabel: Pay AFTER tax and National Insurance

et3ResponseEarningDetailsCorrect.label: Are the pay details given by the claimant correct?

no.hint: You will be able to enter correct pay details at the next step.

notApplicable.hint: If you select 'Not applicable', you will not be able to enter pay details.
